City Commission

The City of Canyon City Commission consists of 5 members elected at large. Â Commissioners can be contacted by email or by calling 806-655-5000 ext. 223.

Mayor Place 1 - Gary Hinders ghinders@canyontx.com

Mayor Pro-Tem Place 2 - Cody Jones cjones@canyontx.com

Commissioner Place 3 - Paul R. Lyons plyons@canyontx.com

Commissioner Place 4 - Robyn Cranmer rcranmer@canyontx.com

Commissioner Place 5 - Danny J. Potter dpotter@canyontx.com

  • First and Third Tuesday of each month
  • City Hall, 301 16th St.

Agendas, Minutes and Legal Notices are available for viewing. Agendas will be posted 72 hours before the scheduled City of Canyon Commission meetings. Minutes will be posted once approved by the City Commission. Archives of Agendas and Minutes and Legal or Public Notices are maintained in the document center for 2 years.
